scripts.commit_package: od -A n -t d -N 3 /dev/urandom > ./.rnd && git add .vuepress/public/sitemap.xml package.json ./.rnd && git commit -m sitemap_updated
scripts.tag_patch: yarn run commit_package && npm version patch
scripts.tag_minor: yarn run commit_package && npm version minor
scripts.tag_major: yarn run commit_package && npm version major
scripts.postversion: cross-var git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
